name: Multi Shop
description:
In this Game you are an owner of small shop, that is in country that constantly changes its tax rules and need to count the amount of Tax. Is it posible to run a buisnes whith this unstable economy?

I didnt want to create game in sky or on the celing so I decied to take less literal but I ting it fits the limitation and about the Theme I didnt know what to add so I decided to not add it because themes are optional.

When you try cliking Money from sells, Money spend, Tax boxes you need to click on bottom of the box.

(Sorry for no sound I frogor)

-Move camera - WASD or Arrows

On Right:

-Book Icon shows amount of bought and sold things and there you have to write total of money Spend, Gained and Tax.

-In Shop you can buy basic things for your shop.

-Newspaper shows you current Tax Rule.

Pallete used - https://lospec.com/palette-list/paper-8
